description:
The Pelmo Pants for men was developed specifically for the needs of mountaineers who have to rely on their clothing on long days - and still want to be light on the road.

Cut and designed with Shield Zero material, the Pelmo Pants are ready for any hard-fought elevation gain. The pants are cut narrower at the leg as well as at the hem and have a pre-shaped knee area, which gives the lightweight alpine mountain pants an optimal fit.
In addition, versatile all-rounder scores with high breathability, a low weight, high elasticity and the extremely robust material mix. Inserts with merino wool in the waistband and pockets provide maximum comfort in the right places.

All this has made the Pelmo Pants for men a deserved classic. The PFC-free pants are an excellent companion on all alpine ventures where lightness and functionality are required.
name: Ortovox Pelmo Pants, Short - Mens
